Name: The Office
About the game: The Office is a visual novel for adults only. In this game, you control a guy who just got a new job, but was late on his first day of work. His new boss is unhappy with this delay... The game is filled with sex scenes, humor, romance. In the game The Office you have to visit the body of a young guy who recently got a new job. You are late on your first day at work. Your boss is very unhappy with this. Fuck your boss in her own house and even in the office! Get real pleasure from very simple gameplay and cool music. Beautiful graphics! Relaxing music! Exciting sex scenes!
